name: Solar Realms Rising VR
description:
Put on your VR headset and trek through deep space in a virtual reality sci-fi adventure to get back home. Warp through hyper space, blast asteroids, and repair a jump gate in this hands-free VR experience. Your trusty AI hologram side kick will guide you along your journey.

Solar Realms Rising is the most immersive virtual reality space adventure experience available on mobile devices today.

EASY CONTROLS
No need for any buttons or controllers, just look in any direction to steer your space ship.

IMMERSIVE VIRTUAL REALITY
Supports a full 360 degree view using Google Cardboard or compatible VR headsets.

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Experience stars, planets, galaxy's, nebula, and more with console quality graphics, effects, sounds, and music.

Suggested Use: Sit in a swivel chair (office chair) wearing the VR headset and earphones.
